description: This file contains the implementation of a certificate management API based on ASN.1 structures, including functions for initializing, unloading, adding/removing trusted CAs and subjects, handling CRLs, verifying certificates, extracting information, acquiring certification paths, and creating certificate entities. It appears to be generated code for managing X.509 certificates and related operations within a PKI framework.

classes.name: PALCERT_CONTEXT
classes.description: Pointer to a certificate context structure managing certificate operations and data.

classes.name: PPKI_CLIENT_ENTITY
classes.description: Pointer to a PKI client entity representing a certificate subject, CA, or key pair.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_CERTIFICATE
classes.description: ASN.1 representation of X.509 certificates for decoding and validation.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_NAME
classes.description: ASN.1 structure representing distinguished names within certificates.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_GENERALNAMES
classes.description: ASN.1 structure for handling subject alternative names.

classes.name: PPKI_CLIENT_ENTITY
classes.description: Pointer to a PKI client entity object representing certificates or keys.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_CERTIFICATE
classes.description: ASN.1 structure for X.509 certificate representation.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_CERTIFICATEREQUEST
classes.description: ASN.1 structure for PKCS#10 certificate signing requests.

classes.name: PANSC_ASN1_SUBJECTPUBLICKEYINFO
classes.description: ASN.1 structure for subject public key information within certificates.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertInitialize(AL_HANDLE hUserContext)
methods.description: Initializes certificate context, allocating necessary resources.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertUnload(AL_HANDLE hCertContext)
methods.description: Unloads and cleans up the certificate context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAddTrustedCA(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PVOID pCertEncoding,ULONG ulEncodingSize,PAL_HANDLE phCertHandle)
methods.description: Adds a trusted CA certificate to the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAddSubject(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PVOID pCertEncoding,ULONG ulEncodingSize,PVOID pPrivateKeyEncoding,ULONG ulKeyEncodingSize,PAL_HANDLE phCertHandle)
methods.description: Adds a subject certificate to the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertRemoveTrustedCA(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle)
methods.description: Removes a trusted CA certificate from the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertRemoveSubject(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle)
methods.description: Removes a subject from the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAddCRL(AL_HANDLE hCAHandle,PVOID pCRLEncoding,ULONG ulEncodingSize)
methods.description: Adds a Certificate Revocation List to the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertRemoveCRL(AL_HANDLE hCAHandle)
methods.description: Removes the current CRL from the context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertGetCRLNextUpdateTime(AL_HANDLE hCAHandle,ANSC_HANDLE hTime)
methods.description: Fetches the next update time of the CRL.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertVerify(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,ULONG ulCertPathLength,PVOID * pCertArray,PULONG pulCertSizeArray,PIKE_COMMON_ID pSubjectID,BOOLEAN bCheckId)
methods.description: Verifies a certificate chain against a given context.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireCertInformation(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PAL_INTERNAL_PKI_INFO pInternalPKIInfo)
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information from a certificate.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertExtractCommonNameFromDN(PVOID pDNEncoding,ULONG ulEncodingSize,PCHAR pCommonNameString)
methods.description: Extracts the common name from a distinguished name encoding.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireCertificationPath(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,UCHAR ucCertEncoding,PVOID pCertificateRequirement,ULONG ulRequirementSize,AL_INTERNAL_PKI_KEY_TYPE KeyType,PAL_HANDLE phCertPathContext,PULONG pulCertNumber,BOOLEAN bIncludeRootCA)
methods.description: Acquires a chain of certificates that form a certification path.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireCertificateUnit(AL_HANDLE hCertPathContext,ULONG ulIndex,PUCHAR pucCertEncoding,PVOID pCertUnit,PULONG pulCertUnitSize,PAL_HANDLE phCertHandle,BOOLEAN bIncludeRootCA)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific certificate from a certification path.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireCertificateUnitByHandle(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle,PUCHAR pucCertEncoding,PVOID pCertUnit,PULONG pulCertUnitSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a certificate unit given a handle.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertGetKeyTypeByHandle(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle,PAL_INTERNAL_PKI_KEY_TYPE pKeyType)
methods.description: Gets the key type (RSA, DSA) associated with a certificate handle.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireIDByHandle(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle,PIKE_COMMON_ID pSubjectID)
methods.description: Retrieves identity information from a certificate handle.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAcquireCANameByHandle(AL_HANDLE hCertHandle,PUCHAR pucCertEncoding,PVOID pNameEncoding,PULONG pulNameEncodingSize)
methods.description: Gets CA name encoding from a trusted CA handle.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertCreateEntity(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PASN1_CERTIFICATE_ATTRIBUTE pAttribute,PAL_HANDLE phSubjectHandle)
methods.description: Creates a certificate entity with given attributes.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertCreatePKCS10CertificateRequest(AL_HANDLE hSubjectHandle,PPUCHAR ppEncoding,PULONG pLength)
methods.description: Generates a PKCS#10 certificate signing request for a subject.

methods.name: ALCertCreatePKCS10CertificateRequest
methods.description: Creates a PKCS#10 certificate signing request using the subject handle, encoding buffer, and length pointer.

methods.name: BOOLEAN AL_CERT_API ALCertIsKeyMatchable(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PVOID pCertEncoding,ULONG ulCertSize,PVOID pRequestEncoding,ULONG uRequestSize)
methods.description: Checks whether the public key in a certificate matches the key in a PKCS#10 request.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertGetPrivateKeyInfo(AL_HANDLE hSubjectHandle,PUCHAR * ppKeyEncoding,PULONG pLength,PULONG pKeyType,PULONG pKeyLength)
methods.description: Retrieves private key information and attributes from a certificate subject handle.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertSetIssuedCertificate(AL_HANDLE hSubjectHandle,PUCHAR pCertEncoding,ULONG length)
methods.description: Sets an issued certificate encoding into a certificate entity.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertSetIssuedPKCS7CertChain(AL_HANDLE hSubjectHandle,PUCHAR pCertEncoding,ULONG length)
methods.description: Sets a PKCS#7 certificate chain encoding into a certificate entity.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertMime64Encoding(PVOID pInputData,ULONG ulSizeOfInputData,PVOID pOutputData,PULONG pSizeOfOutputData)
methods.description: Encodes binary data into base64 (mime64) format.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertMime64Decoding(PVOID pInputData,ULONG ulSizeOfInputData,PVOID pOutputData,PULONG pSizeOfOutputData)
methods.description: Decodes base64 (mime64) encoded data into binary form.

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertAddPKIServer(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PAL_PKI_SERVER_INFO pPKIServerInfo,PAL_HANDLE phServerHandle)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertImportPKIServer(AL_HANDLE hCertContext,PVOID pCertEncoding,ULONG ulEncodingSize,PVOID pPrivateKeyEncoding,ULONG ulKeyEncodingSize,PAL_HANDLE phServerHandle)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertRemovePKIServer(AL_HANDLE hServerHandle)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertRetrievePKIServerCert(AL_HANDLE hServerHandle,PVOID pCertEncoding,PULONG pulEncodingSize,PVOID pPrivateKeyEncoding,PULONG pulKeySize)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: AL_STATUS AL_CERT_API ALCertSignPKIClient(AL_HANDLE hServerHandle,PAL_PKI_CLIENT_INFO pPKIClientInfo,PVOID pCertEncoding,PULONG pulEncodingSize,PVOID pPrivateKeyEncoding,PULONG pulKeyEncodingSize)
methods.description: unavailable
